channel.title: Who is Luke?
channel.description:
And why does he insist on attacking servers, yet provide no reason why?
When I ask him why, I get the normal nerdy response of "umad?" or " stfu kid".

item.title: Who is Luke?
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:14, topic:433922"][quote author=freaky5000 link=topic=536639.msg3924007#msg3924007 date=1330019061]
@Imthenull, There are many lukes around the rsc community, there are also a couple of lukes who enjoy ddosing, yes i know kryptix is called luke, and yes he did help me. How am i being two faced? Hold your fucking tongue before you try and making somebody look stupid.

@NoLives - I rareley come on here only now and then, I must apologise that i couldn’t be fucked to remove it from my signature. I was part of codestream for a couple of years so even if it’s not still going I have the right to keep it there as I use to be an admin. It was brought back up but then TeamGuard had to fullfil is real life obligations. Now please fuck off.
[/quote]
You already made a fool out of yourself, now, leave.[/quote]

Why post on both accounts?

Read full topic

item.title: Who is Luke?
item.dc:creator: @Ecko Ecko
item.description:
@Ecko wrote:

Kryptix:

The forum was made subscriber only for a while because of the spam bots. No other reason. It was a major inconvenience and has since been reverted. Get your facts right.

ever heard of recaptcha

item.title: Who is Luke?
item.dc:creator: @Botox Botox
item.description:
@Botox wrote:

Sorry, are you mad that I’m knowledgeable? Dear lord, I’ve forgotten where I am, let me dumb myself down.

Read full topic

item.title: Who is Luke?
item.dc:creator: @Kryptix Kryptix
item.description:
@Kryptix wrote:

Botox:

Interested and knowledgeable are two different things. Just because I know what goes one, doesnt mean I want to experience it. The same way you know what goes on with other servers yet have no interest getting involved.

I don’t though. I don’t know who you are, I don’t know what server you’re talking about, I couldn’t even tell you what other servers are active right now without looking through the advertisement section.

You however know me, know my real name, know what server I run, know about the community, know about subscribing and only subscribers being able to post, know about my hosting package and DDoS protection and so on. There’s a huge difference. We both know you know far more than that as well but I can only list what you’ve admitted to knowing in this very thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Who is Luke?
item.dc:creator: @Botox Botox
item.description:
@Botox wrote:

Interested and knowledgeable are two different things. Just because I know what goes one, doesnt mean I want to experience it. The same way you know what goes on with other servers yet have no interest getting involved.

Read full topic

item.title: Who is Luke?
item.dc:creator: @Kryptix Kryptix
item.description:
@Kryptix wrote:

Botox:

Where did I say “Kryptix is ddosing servers”? Assuming things isnt beneficial to anyone. I simply asked who Luke was, I know your name is also Luke, but I am refering to the person who consistantly ddos’s servers on the NAME Luke. Dont come in my topic and assume the world revolves around you, that every topic that might be close to you, is about you.

If you ask anyone in this scene who ‘Luke’ is 99% of them will claim it’s me. I’m not being big headed, that’s just how it is… If someone is using the name ‘Luke’ they are more than likely impersonating me (especially if they’re being malicious towards another server).

Botox:

You run a horrible server with a horrible community

Debatable but you’re welcome to your own opinion.

Botox:

the ONLY reason you have any success is because you can afford upgraded ddos protection while new servers cant.

Lots of new servers are hosted by Staminus and still fail. I could name at least 5 off the top of my head. RSCEmulation started off hosted on a PC, we could only afford a dedicated server after it started to gain interest and we could introduce the subscription system. If a server fails it’s easier to blame DDoS and funding than admit they didn’t have the knowledge, experience and patience to keep it online.

Botox:

Paying to post on forums?? How absurd is that. Go back and milk your community for more money.

The forum was made subscriber only for a while because of the spam bots. No other reason. It was a major inconvenience and has since been reverted. Get your facts right.

Botox:

I couldnt even pretend to be interested in you or your server.

You just wrote a post about me and my server demonstrating you have shown at least some interest in it… Think before you hit the submit button as you’re really making yourself look stupid.

Read full topic

item.title: Who is Luke?
item.dc:creator: @Botox Botox
item.description:
@Botox wrote:

Where did I say “Kryptix is ddosing servers”? Assuming things isnt beneficial to anyone. I simply asked who Luke was, I know your name is also Luke, but I am refering to the person who consistantly ddos’s servers on the NAME Luke. I couldnt even pretend to be interested in you or your server.

You run a horrible server with a horrible community, the ONLY reason you have any success is because you can afford upgraded ddos protection while new servers cant. Paying to post on forums?? How absurd is that. Go back and milk your community for more money. Dont come in my topic and assume the world revolves around you, that every topic that might be close to you, is about you.

Read full topic

item.title: Who is Luke?
item.dc:creator: @Kryptix Kryptix
item.description:
@Kryptix wrote:

I have absolute zero interest in any projects other than my own. I couldn’t even pretend to be interested in whatever server you’re accusing me of attacking.

item.title: Who is Luke?

item.description:
@Jost wrote:

Ganja83:

He’s a noob that DDos’ kid’s servers because he wants to keep his “350” people online daily server top tier. When I say 350 it’s actually more along the lines of 60-80 people having multiple clients open. See also: Freaky’s post

item.title: Who is Luke?
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote=“freaky5000, post:3, topic:433922”]The nearest reason anybody would probably give you is that the kid is a total virgin, never touched a girl in anyway apart from sucking on his own sister/mothers titties. He has maybe 1 or 2 real life friends who he only see’s when they come visit him in his bedroom. And if you was to look at his firefox cookies you’d find links such as penisland.com.

Theres your reason. Anybody feel free to add anything i missed out.[/quote]

you have a signature of you being the administrator of a website that doesnt even work anymore, just to boost your ego?[/quote]
